verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day<s%> you will <S%H559>say,<s%> "I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh; for though you were <S%H599>angry<s%> with <S%H639>me,<s%> your anger has turned <S%H7725>away<s%> and you comfort <S%H5162>me.<s%>

<S%H410>Behold,<s%> God is my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%> I will <S%H982>trust,<s%> and will not be <S%H6342>afraid;<s%> for <S%H3050>Yah,<s%> <S%H3050>Yahweh,<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song;<s%> and he has become my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>"
Therefore with <S%H8342>joy<s%> you will <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H4599>wells<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> you will <S%H559>say,<s%> "Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> on his <S%H8034>name.<s%> <S%H3045>Declare<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%> <S%H2142>Proclaim<s%> that his <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7682>exalted!<s%>
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he has <S%H6213>done<s%> excellent <S%H1348>things!<s%> Let this be <S%H3045>known<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth!<s%>

Cry <S%H6670>aloud<s%> and <S%H7442>shout,<s%> you <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> for the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in the midst of <S%H7130>you!<s%>"
